stories.text:
Have you ever been overwhelmed by the amount of research it takes to plan the perfect trip and just end up asking your friends for recs?

That’s why we’re building Camber, a new travel recommendations app that allows you to list out your favorite places by city, follow friends to see theirs, and view those recs on an all-inclusive map. Upon launch, we plan to build a marketplace to allow influential jet-setters to monetize their curated guides (think Patreon but for travel creators).

We are looking for a Full-stack Developer to build out and manage our mobile app infrastructure. We’re a team of two female founders. Therefore, a pioneering spirit and enthusiasm about the success and care of Camber’s community is necessary.

As a founding team member, you will have the opportunity to add direct value to our technology and product strategy. If you have an appreciation for visual design and utility and also tend to be the person that your friends go to for recs, then we’d love to meet you.

Location: Los Angeles, open to remote.

What you’d be responsible for: - Building an innovative product from the ground up - Collaborating on high-level decisions regarding product features and direction - Having authority and ownership of your day-to-day structure

What your resume would say: - Proven experience as a Full Stack Developer or similar role - Experience developing mobile applications in React Native - An analytical mind with appreciation for design

Did we just describe you to a T? Well then, we can’t wait to meet you. Email your resume to hello@camberapp.com and feel free to send a couple sentences about yourself.

Learn more and download our beta app here: https://camberapp.com/
stories.title: Early-stage travel app is hiring a founding engineer
